channel.title: Problem with my "sendmessage ("message here") = false"
channel.description:
Yeah I tried to delete this: [code]sM("my message here");[/code]
and simply did: [code]sM("");[/code]
which still sent a message in game of just a blank line. I moved on to doing this: [code]sM("") = false;[/code]
and compiled and got: [code]client.java6774: unexpected type required: variable found : value sM("") = false; ^[/code]
I've tried adding the bracket but it didn't work but I'm not positive I did it right.
EDIT: Most people nowadays on Moparscape don't know what the hell this means. If you answer it, then you should know that you know SOMETHING about private servers. This is a simple question, probably something extremely easy to answer for people from old Mopar.

item.title: Problem with my "sendmessage ("message here") = false"
item.dc:creator: @N11 -N-
item.description:
@N11 wrote:

Yeah I tried to delete this:

sM("my message here");

and simply did:

sM("");

which still sent a message in game of just a blank line. I moved on to doing this:

sM("") = false;

and compiled and got:

client.java6774: unexpected type required: variable found : value sM("") = false; ^

I’ve tried adding the bracket but it didn’t work but I’m not positive I did it right.

EDIT: Most people nowadays on Moparscape don’t know what the hell this means. If you answer it, then you should know that you know SOMETHING about private servers. This is a simple question, probably something extremely easy to answer for people from old Mopar.

Read full topic
